Text:
Is this the "Joe Hill" that is as wikipedia says. 
The son of Stephen King ??
Brilliant! Thank you. I love this book, love Joe Hill. He does his old man justice. Yep his dad is Stephen King.

REALLY REALLY hoping this will d/l ..i see no seeders and don't know enough about this stuff to know..but I thank the uploader GRACIOUSLY coz I'm soooo excited to read this! so THANK YOU in advance...pray it'll finish :)
